p: For histological examination hematoxylin/eosin (H/E) was made and observed blinded to the treatment protocol. Briefly, paw tissues were taken at the end of experiment, and were dehydrated, embedded in Paraplast, and cut into sections of 7 Î¼m and observed under microscopy (Leica DM7, Milan, Italy). The gradation of inflammation was estimated according a score based on 5 point: none, mild, mild/moderate, moderate, moderate/severe, and severe inflammation [ 54, 55].
